title: Sonoma
name: Taste of the Himalayas
directions: down the Paseo off the Square
content: Locally owned Himalayan restaurant that is the social hub for the Nepalese community. Taste is a friendly spot with simple indoor and outdoor seating. You can get traditional HImalayan dishes, as well as Indian classics like Chicken Tikka. Each meal comes with a bowl of soup, and lunchtime offers specials. Grab a Nepali beer, too! Takeout available.
